name: Cowtibiotics
description:
Cowtibiotics was created, because for some reason, a friend got the idea for a game, where you have to feed a cow antibiotics. Otherwise it will become ill.

The game was just made for fun and I'm really bad at developing games, so I don't recommend to play that.

DISCLAIMER: Giving your cows antibiotics when they don't need it is really bad for them. Please don't do that at home!!

HaVe FuN!!! :-)

View Sourcecode on Github!
